Uses of Class
logic.VisitsReport

  • Packages that use VisitsReport 
    Package Description
    jdbc.query  
    utils  

    • Uses of VisitsReport in jdbc.query

      Methods in jdbc.query with parameters of type VisitsReport 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean ReportsQueries.generateVisitsReport(VisitsReport report)
      Generates a visits report for a given park, month, and year, including details on the number of visitors by type and visit duration.
      private boolean ReportsQueries.getParkIdleVisitTimeSummary(VisitsReport report)
      Retrieves a summary of visitor idle times by type for a given park, month, and year.
      private boolean ReportsQueries.getParkVisitsSummaryByEnterTime(VisitsReport report)
      Calculates the summary of park visits based on the time of entry, segmented into hourly intervals for various types of visits.
      byte[] ReportsQueries.getRequestedVisitsReport(VisitsReport report)
      Retrieves the blob content of a previously generated visits report from the database.
      private boolean ReportsQueries.insertVisitsAmountReportToDatabase(VisitsReport report)
      Inserts or updates a generated visits amount report into the database for a specified park, month, and year.

    • Uses of VisitsReport in utils

      Methods in utils with parameters of type VisitsReport 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] ReportGenerator.generateVisitsReportAsPdf(VisitsReport report)
      Generates a comprehensive visits report for a specified park and time period as a PDF.
